comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called NSW-WEST, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: The pic accompanying this 1894 Sydney Mail article appears to date from about the same time...the pic is on p. 651 - news.google.com/newspapers?id=xDNVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=4pQDA... If you're interested, Charles Bean (the later war correspondent) wrote a series of articles titled 'The Dreadnought of the Darling' which appeared in the Sydney Mail in 1910 (pics included)...the first article appeared in the July 13 issue - news.google.com/newspapers?id=XUsQAAAAIBAJ&sjid=HJIDA...
